title: magazine layout design
content:
hello everyone. I am looking for some good websites with general tips or advice about creating a magazine layout in inDesign. Any replies would be greatly appreciated :)

 [‹ Variant infinity](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810003710/http:/typophile.com/node/19186 "Go to previous forum topic") [Outline font problem ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810003710/http:/typophile.com/node/19171 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alva86
